segments.text: Wow , it all looks so good . I ’ m not sure what to choose .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can recommend the spare ribs . They are very tasty here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Actually , I ate too much pork yesterday . I fancy a change .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok why don ’ t you order the braised fish then ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That sounds like a good idea . It looks very big though .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don ’ t worry . I ’ ll help you eat it .
segments.speaker: S2
